channel.title: tidyverse on tidyverse tips
channel.description: Recent content in tidyverse on tidyverse tips

item.title: Function for annotating regression plots
item.description: This post covers how to create a plot that displays the regression equation (lm(outcome ~ predictor, data = Tibble) and the R squared. Both of these statistics are important for interpreting models, so it makes sense that we would want these on a plot.
